WorkItem.ClosedComment: Hunter in 2.2.25 will have this corrected
WorkItem.Description: The current (2.2.4) builds don't show how much hit the current gear setup may be missing to be hit capped.  It just shows the percentage.  I believe it would be useful to update to include that value which is certain to be part of the formulas under the hood.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Hunter] Display Hit needed for cap
